description:
New virtual event - OWASP CTF 2021, led by OWASP Dorset Chapter and in collaboration with OWASP Diversity and Inclusion Committee and UK Chapters: Bristol, Cambridge, London, Newcastle, Reading, Suffolk.

The CTF will be hosted by Security Innovation and be instructor lead. It combines with Security Innovation's CMD+Ctrl Bootcamp and they are extending an offer to all participants for 4-weeks FREE access to the self-paced training courses.

Although the event is online, as this is a live participatory event it will not be recorded.

Event registration link will be shared nearer to the time.
title: OWASP CTF 2021 (Virtual event)
